import React, { useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import '../styles/CourseSection.css'; const CourseSection = () => { useEffect(() => { // Hide some courses initially if on homepage if (!window.location.pathname.includes('/courses')) { const courseCards = document.querySelectorAll('.course-card'); if (courseCards.length >= 4) { courseCards[3].style.display = 'none'; courseCards[4].style.display = 'none'; courseCards[5].style.display = 'none'; } } }, []); const showAllCourses = () => { const courseCards = document.querySelectorAll('.course-card'); courseCards.forEach(card => { card.style.display = 'flex'; }); const viewAllBtn = document.getElementById('viewAllCoursesBtn'); if (viewAllBtn) { viewAllBtn.textContent = 'All Courses Displayed'; viewAllBtn.classList.add('btn-disabled'); viewAllBtn.onclick = null; } // Scroll to show newly displayed courses if (courseCards[3]) { setTimeout(() => { courseCards[3].scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth', block: 'center' }); }, 100); } }; return ( <>
